channel.title: Running 2 servers on same ip and port? something to do with height?
channel.description:
Hey guys i was woundering how to run 2 servers off the same ip and port i read somthing about this and the guy said change the height, what does he mean by this and how do i do it? thanks
Danny

item.title: Running 2 servers on same ip and port? something to do with height?
item.dc:creator: @wwe_justin wwe justin
item.description:
@wwe_justin wrote:

no you cant run 2 servers off the same port

but you can run 2 servers off the same ip with two ports

here are two runescape ports

43594
5555

eg. port 43594 is running my 317 server
port 5555 is running my 508 server
43594 doesnt mean its for a 317 any server
even port 5555

just an example for you

hope this helped

Read full topic
item.source: Running 2 servers on same ip and port? something to do with height?
